content.webTitle: Miranda ... coming to a big screen near you?

fields.headline: Miranda ... coming to a big screen near you?
fields.bodyText: Miranda co-star Sarah Hadland has fuelled expectations of a big screen version of Miranda Hart’s BBC1 sitcom. Hart, who won’t be reviving the Generation Game for BBC1 any time soon, is thinking about a Miranda movie, Hadland told the Radio Times. Asked what chance there was of a Miranda film, Hadland, who plays Stevie in the comedy, said: “I think that is something in the future that Miranda is thinking about. “I’m on the case. I’m always saying to her, ‘Please make sure you do, because it will be great.”
